txt.en: Gathered extra blades of the Rohirrim ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Fastred wants you to arm the crofters of Snowbourn in preparation for what he believes will be a substantial assault on the settlement.

'Sigeric... even the name disgusts me.

'Does he truly think himself so untouchable? I will correct that mind of his in my own time.

'In the meantime, I want the people of Snowbourn prepared for battle. We know not the force we face, and must make ready for anything.

'Gather arms and armour from the blacksmith and about Snowbourn. Outfit the people, and then return to me. We must have everyone involved - we cannot risk defeat, not here at the edge of the Westemnet...'
Extra arms and armour can be found scattered throughout Snowbourn and inside the Snowbourn barracks.

'They are outfitted, then?

'Good, we will need every able-bodied warrior we can spare for the coming conflict.

'I know not when it will fall, but Snowbourn will be prepared!'
Having collected arms and armour, you should now distribute it to the crofters of Snowbourn. The crofters can be found throughout the settlement.
Fastred can be found in the mead-hall of Snowbourn.
Fastred can be found in the mead-hall of Snowbourn.
